pages.title: Idols
pages.text: Idols are compact magical artifacts used to influence weather or cleanse items. All specialized idols are crafted from a base $(thing)Silk Idol$().

pages.title: Silk Idol (Base)
pages.text: Crafted from Silk and $(l:hexalia:resources/herbs)Crushed Herbs$(/l). Serves as the conduit for all specialized idols.

pages.title: Rainfall Idol
pages.text: Hold right-click to activate. $(bold)Effect$(): Summons rain for $(bold)5 minutes$().

pages.title: Clarity Idol
pages.text: Hold right-click to activate. $(bold)Effect$(): Clears rain and thunderstorms immediately.

pages.title: Tempest Idol
pages.text: Hold right-click to activate. $(bold)Effect$(): Summons a thunderstorm for $(bold)5 minutes$().

pages.title: Purity Idol
pages.text: $(bold)Function$(): Removes curses from enchanted items.$(br)$(bold)Use$(): Hold the Purity Idol in one hand and the cursed item in the otherâ€”curses like Binding or Vanishing are safely removed.
